sql-case.value: INSERT INTO t_order (order_id, user_id, status) VALUES (1, 10, 0), (2, ?, 1)
INSERT INTO t_order VALUES (3, 20, ?)
UPDATE t_order o LEFT JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id SET o.status = 1, i.status = 2 WHERE o.order_id = ? AND i.user_id = ?
ALTER TABLE db1.t_order DELETE WHERE order_id = ?

SELECT DISTINCT *, o.*, sum(i.amount) AS total_amount, o.status AS status_alias, o.order_id + i.order_id AS merged_id, toString(o.user_id) AS user_text FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i USING (order_id) WHERE o.status = ? AND i.amount > 100 GROUP BY o.order_id, i.order_id, o.status, o.user_id HAVING sum(i.amount) > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC, merged_id
SELECT 0x1A AS hex_lit, 0b101 AS bit_lit, TRUE AS bool_lit, NULL AS nil FROM t_order
SELECT POSITION('a' IN 'abc') AS pos, CAST(order_id AS DATETIME64(3)) AS price, CAST(1 AS INT8) AS tiny, INTERVAL 2 DAY AS inter, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS cnt FROM t_order ORDER BY 1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE NOT (status > 0)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE status NOT LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item) AND status IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE amount = (SELECT 1)
SELECT ? AS param_alias
SELECT (SELECT 1) AS sub_val FROM t_order
UPDATE t_order SET status = 0
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE status <=> 1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20 AND user_id NOT IN (4, 5)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE amount BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE status LIKE 'A%'
SELECT order_time + INTERVAL 2 DAY AS interval_added, CAST(amount AS DATETIME64(10, 2)) AS amount_decimal, (status) AS 'wrapped_status' FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM (SELECT order_id FROM t_order) sub JOIN t_order_item i ON sub.order_id = i.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order o, t_order_item i
SELECT * FROM t_order NATURAL JOIN t_order_item
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order
SELECT ALL amount FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE status IS TRUE OR amount > 100
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE is_deleted IS FALSE
SELECT * FROM (t_order o RIGHT JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id) CROSS JOIN t_user u
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE (status = 1)
INSERT INTO t_order VALUES (DEFAULT)
SELECT order_id + 1 FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE hex_col = X'1A' AND bit_col = B'101'
UPDATE t_order SET status = DEFAULT WHERE order_id = 1
ALTER TABLE t_order DELETE
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE status IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE status <=> (SELECT 1)
SELECT 'abc', 123, TRUE, X'1A', ? FROM t_order
SELECT order_time + INTERVAL 1 DAY AS next_day FROM t_order
SELECT SUM(DISTINCT amount + 1) FROM t_order
SELECT CAST(1 AS INT8) FROM t_order
